name: B O U N C E
name_original: B O U N C E
description:
A bouncy platformer/fps race, where you use recoil as a movement tool. Every surface, including you, is bouncy. Shoot down the Observers and reach the finish line in the fastest time you can. Chain together recoil and hitting surfaces to ricochet yourself faster and faster to the finishing line. Hit R at any time to restart a run. Featuring a rear view mirror, for your navigational convenience!

WASD -  movement
Left Click -  fire gun
R - reload scene

Super quick prototype/jam submission, might expand on later.
